ygData.subject: Lambent Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: I took it upon myself to translate the wording of what the different people say into a rather straight forward format.  I know I much prefer this
ygData.messageBody:
I took it upon myself to translate the wording of what the different people
say into a rather straight forward format. I know I much prefer this
representation over the words when I want to make a list for myself. Hope
you all appreciate my work :). Thanks to whoever did the original work
over at concert hall.



Walthin Fireweaver :
Lambent Gauntlets - Shin Gauntlets (Froglok Shin Knight)[Guk] and Black
Silk Gloves (Deathly Usher) [Mistmoore] and Lambent Star Ruby
Lambent Greaves - Icy Greaves (Elite Goblin Guard)[Permafrost] and Shin
Greaves (Shin Ghoul Knight) [LGuk] and Lambent Fire Opal
Lambent Boots - Firewalker Boots (Solusek Mage)[SolB?] and middle portion
of Rune of the One Eye (Froon)[W Karana?] and Lambent Sapphire

Cryssia Stardreamer :
Lambent Helm - Opoline Helm (Deepwater Goblin)[Oasis, Lake Rathe] and
Mudwater Rune (Lizard Fanatic)[Cazic] and Lambent Star Ruby
Lambent Bracers - Dark Boned Bracelet (Greater Dark Boned
Skeleton)[Unrest], Griffenne Charm (Griffenne)[N Karana] and Lambent Fire Opal
Lambent Vambraces - Fiery Vambraces (Solusek Champion)[SolB?] and top
portion of Rune of the One Eye (Choon)[W Karana?] and Lambent Sapphire
Lambent Breastplates - Basalt Carapace (Basalt Gargoyle)[LGuk] and a Gypsy
Lute (named gypsy?)[Mistmoore] and Lambent Ruby

Lambent Stones - (Hill Giants, Sand Giants and Griffons)[Ro, Karana, Oasis,
Rathe Mountains, Commons]

Genni :
Fire Opal - 550gp (must be gold)
Star Ruby Lambent - 2 Star Rubies and Lambent Stone

Sister Vilissia : Ruby Lambent - 2 Rubies and Lambent Stone

Brother Gardern : Saphire Lambent - 2 Sapphires and Lambent Stone

Brother Ostorm : Fire Opal Lambent - 2 Fire Opals and Lambent Stone



Celandro Spellsong
34 Bard Povar
